00041 class SysSocket : public SysSocketBase
00042 {
00043     friend class SocketRxThread;
00044     friend class DataConn;
00045 
00046     public:
00047         class FdSet : public fd_set {
00048             public:
00049                 FdSet() { Reset(); }
00050 
00051                 BOOLEAN TestFor(const SysSocket &s) const { return FD_ISSET(s.GetHdl(), this); }
00052                 void Add(const SysSocket &s) { FD_SET(s.GetHdl(), this); }
00053                 void Remove(const SysSocket &s) { FD_CLR(s.GetHdl(), this); }
00054                 void Reset() { FD_ZERO(this); }
00055 
00056                 FdSet& operator=(const FdSet &fds) {
00057                     memcpy((fd_set *) this, &(const fd_set &) fds, sizeof(fd_set));
00058                     return *this;
00059                 }
00060         };
00061 
00062         typedef int SocketHdl;
00063 
00064         enum Type {
00065             c_type_dgram = SOCK_DGRAM,
00066             c_type_stream = SOCK_STREAM,
00067             c_type_raw = SOCK_RAW
00068         };
00069 
00070         enum AddrFamily {
00071             c_addr_family_inet = AF_INET,
00072             c_addr_family_unspec = AF_UNSPEC
00073         };
00074 
00075         enum {
00076             c_pref_stack_size = 2000            // preferred stack size for SocketRxThread
00077         };
00078 
00079         typedef int Protocol;
00080 
00081         SysSocket(SocketHdl socket = -1);
00082 
00083         BOOLEAN IsValid() const { return m_socket != -1; }
00084         SocketHdl GetHdl() const { return m_socket; }
00085 
00086         static SocketHdl GetInvalidHdl() { return -1; }
00087 
00088         BOOLEAN Init(INT af, INT type, INT protocol);
00089         INT Close();
00090 
00091         BOOLEAN Accept(SysSocket *s, InetSocketAddr *peer);
00092         INT Bind(const InetSocketAddr &addr);
00093         INT Connect(const InetSocketAddr &peer);
00094 
00095         INT Listen(INT backlog) { return listen(m_socket, backlog); }
00096         INT Recv(void *buf, INT buflen, INT flags) { return recv(m_socket, (CHAR *) buf, buflen, flags); }
00097         INT RecvFrom(void *buf, INT buflen, INT flags, InetSocketAddr &peer);
00098 
00099         INT Send(const void *buf, INT buflen, INT flags) { return send(m_socket, (CHAR *) buf, buflen, flags); }
00100         INT SendTo(const void *buf, INT buflen, INT flags, const InetSocketAddr &peer);
00101 
00102         INT Shutdown(INT how) { return shutdown(m_socket, how); }
00103 
00104         INT GetLocal(InetSocketAddr &local);
00105         INT GetPeer(InetSocketAddr &peer);
00106 
00107         INT GetInBufByteCount(UINT &arg) { return ioctlsocket(m_socket, FIONREAD, &arg); }
00108 
00109         INT GetOption(OptionType type, INT &val);
00110         INT SetOption(OptionType type, INT val);
00111         
00112         SocketError GetSysError();
00113 
00114     private:
00115         SocketHdl m_socket;
00116 
00117         static INT Select(SysSocket::FdSet &readfds, SysSocket::FdSet &writefds, const Ticks *t_timeout = 0);
00118         static INT SignalSelect();
00119 
00120         static SocketError MapSysErrorCode(INT err);
00121         static BOOLEAN MapOptionType(SysSocket::OptionType type, INT &so_level, INT &so_type);
00122 
00123         static INT SystemInit() { return net_Init(); }
00124         static INT PppConnSetup(const CHAR *account, const CHAR *pwd, PppConnSetupDone callback);
00125         static void PppCallBack(NetError err);
00126         static INT PppStop(PppConnSetupDone callback) {
00127             callback(0);
00128             return 0;
00129         };
00130 };
